text: Pilosocereus glaucochrous is a species of plant in the family Cactaceae. It is endemic to eastern Brazil, in central Bahia state. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical dry forests. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== ==Sources== * Zappi, D. & Taylor, N.P. 2013. Pilosocereus glaucochrous. The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Version 2015.1. . title: Pilosocereus glaucochrous
